article_title: North Carolina's Certificate Of Need Law

article_metadata.description: Kari Travis, associate editor at Carolina Journal, co-wrote this piece. It’s pretty messed up what North Carolina hospitals have to go through just to be able to own an MRI machine. That’s what we learned last week while sitting in a stuffy government building on the grounds of a former psychiatric hospital [...]
article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo
